name: Toyota Land Cruiser
description: The Toyota Land Cruiser is a rugged and capable SUV known for its off-road prowess and luxurious features.
design_and_styling_features: Iconic design with a strong and robust appearance. Spacious interior with high-quality materials.
engine_options_range: Powerful V8 engine options for excellent off-road performance.
technology_safety_features: Advanced safety features including adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, and more.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Comfortable and well-appointed interior with features like leather seats, premium sound systems, and more.

name: Toyota Avalon
description: The Toyota Avalon is a full-size sedan known for its comfort, spacious interior, and smooth ride.
design_and_styling_features: Elegant and modern design with a focus on aerodynamics and style.
engine_options_range: Efficient V6 engine options for a balance of power and fuel economy.
technology_safety_features: Comprehensive safety features including adaptive cruise control, automatic emergency braking, and more.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Spacious and comfortable interior with features like leather upholstery, premium infotainment systems, and more.

name: Toyota Mirai
description: The Toyota Mirai is a hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicle (FCEV) known for its eco-friendliness and advanced technology.
design_and_styling_features: Futuristic and aerodynamic design with a focus on hydrogen fuel cell technology.
engine_options_range: Hydrogen fuel cell powertrain that generates electricity for the vehicle's electric motor.
technology_safety_features: Advanced safety features with a focus on hydrogen safety and emissions reduction.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Comfortable and technologically advanced interior with features like a touchscreen infotainment system and premium materials.

name: Toyota Venza
description: The Toyota Venza is a stylish and efficient crossover SUV known for its hybrid powertrain and comfortable interior.
design_and_styling_features: Sleek and modern design with a focus on aerodynamics and hybrid efficiency.
engine_options_range: Hybrid powertrain for excellent fuel efficiency and a smooth, quiet ride.
technology_safety_features: Advanced safety features including adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, and more.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Spacious and well-appointed interior with features like a panoramic sunroof, premium audio systems, and more.
